channel.title: DHO - Tribute (A Fond Farewell) [Melodic] + Farewell Announcement
channel.description:
Hey, everyone! ;P
Unfortunately, I'm no longer going to be running tournaments here at the Disco, due to a variety of reasons. Mainly due to the dwindling activity on the Disco and my interests moving away from electronic music. I whipped up one last track as a tribute to the Auxians who inspired me in the early days to work hard and hone my skills, and who still inspire me to this day. I wonder, can you guess who each section is a tribute to?
https://soundcloud.com/dhomusic/tribute-a-fond-farewell
Best wishes! DHO

item.title: DHO - Tribute (A Fond Farewell) [Melodic] + Farewell Announcement
item.dc:creator: rosenthal.scott
item.description:
I only did the one tournament, but it was a real highlight for me, and pushed me to be better. Thanks!
